name: Hunt them
description:
Hey there this is my first indie game in process of completion and if you like it please download and give review about it for improvement .

Hunt them is a survival zombie shooter game in which you are last army man survival and  has to stop zombie from kill you and the town.

Control of the game

w     - move  forward

s       -move backward

a      -move left

d     -  move right

r     -reload

mouse button 3 -for changing gun

left click - to fire

ctrl         - crouch and more

 hold E - to buy 

hope you enjoy game cheers
